definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: I particularly love their Rice Noodle Soup, and the Panang Curry chicken over rice.
sentences.chinese: 我特別喜歡他們的牛肉湯河粉和黃咖哩雞燴飯。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的觀看與支持，你是指滑雪還是越南河粉？

sentences.english: Objective For the sake of investigating and restructuring the market of wet rice noodle in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 目的調查和整頓廣州市河粉生產市場。

definition: rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
yi mein (or yee mee or yee-fu noodles etc), a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
satay (spicy peanut sauce), also spelled sate
